query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZUSERMACA SET IPADDR = #IPADDR# , MACADDR = #MACADDR# , BIGO = #BIGO# , CONFNO = #CONFNO# , CONFDT = #CONFDT# , CONFTM = HEX(CURRENT TIME) , UDATE = HEX(CURRENT DATE) , UTIME = HEX(CURRENT TIME) , UUSER = #USERNUMB# WHERE USERNUMB = #USERNUMB# AND MANDT = #MANDT# AND SERIAL = (SELECT MAX(SERIAL) FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERMACA WHERE MANDT = #MANDT# AND USERNUMB = #USERNUMB#)
